title: 7/25/17 - GOP: Clown show of a party (Chris Herrod Joins Glenn)
description:
How much have we changed since the time of 'Game of Thrones'?? ...The never ending lies of the GOP ...May God have mercy on the souls of our 'representatives' in DC ...Do we give congressmen enough? ...The curious relationship between Donald Trump and Jeff Sessions ...Why is President Trump going after his own attorney general? ...Clean Obamacare repeal vote coming today? ...What is a 'skinny repeal'??

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
